channel.title: [Feedback] [SFM] Insurgency Setup Feedback (to help for Insurgency II, if it ever happens)
channel.description:
Hi all,
I'm seeking feedback for the Insurgency setup to use for Insurgency II if that ever happens. Insurgency II, if it happens, will be based on Fire Emblem 7 and 6. https://fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Fire_Emblem:_The_Blazing_Blade https://fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Fire_Emblem:_The_Binding_Blade
There are no skills in FE 7 or 6 so those would be gone. However, in their place will be named weapons of each type, some of which will be more powerful than others in terms of hit chance and special abilities (For example, Iron Axe / Steel Axe / Killer Axe / Silver Axe / Devil Axe, or something). Maybe stat-boosters in the shop as well, and I might add new stat types, like skill, luck, and/or others too.
Many features will remain the same, just different flavour. It would still be a dual-gen game.
Gib feedback pls.

item.title: [Feedback] [SFM] Insurgency Setup Feedback (to help for Insurgency II, if it ever happens)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
It isn’t. But i was an uber n00b host and didn’t understand how FPS worked in the slightest back then.

Read full topic
